about_the_game:
06-27-2024
Update Event: https://www.linkedin.com/events/blockchainpreparationparty7211943702561202177/comments/

NeverRage is a small Open World online role-playing game with a linear beginning. NeverRage has action combat and tab targetting options for the two categories of players out there. In addition to that, it contains open-world exploration, crafting, building, political conflicts, campaigns and sieges, dungeons, raids, as well as arena and open-world PVP... I have decided to focus primarily on programming instead of graphic design; yep, NeverRage is going to be a low poly, low graphic, stylized role-playing game. With this art choice, the game will feature (Simulated Randomly Generated Content), and player housing, while allowing room for more Feature base content creation

content_descriptors.notes:
The Character customization, when available, might allow users to view their character in their underwear. 
The gameplay will include a combat system that allows in-game characters to strike at each other with tools in violent ways. The graphics will include blood splatters. Creatures (When added) and Characters will lose health, and die. Users will be allowed to interact with each other, users might steal or say mean words to each other. We will try to moderate this, however, we are unable to stop users from playing with each other.

detailed_description:
Web Preview

https://www.linkedin.com/events/blockchainpreparationparty7211943702561202177/comments/


About the Demo

06-27-2024 Update Event: https://www.linkedin.com/events/blockchainpreparationparty7211943702561202177/comments/ NeverRage is a small Open World online role-playing game with a linear beginning. NeverRage has action combat and tab targetting options for the two categories of players out there. In addition to that, it contains open-world exploration, crafting, building, political conflicts, campaigns and sieges, dungeons, raids, as well as arena and open-world PVP... I have decided to focus primarily on programming instead of graphic design; yep, NeverRage is going to be a low poly, low graphic, stylized role-playing game. With this art choice, the game will feature (Simulated Randomly Generated Content), and player housing, while allowing room for more Feature base content creation

  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
